title: backup-stream: failpoint tests may fail
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
Current master.

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
x86, ubuntu 22

### Steps to reproduce
FAIL_POINT=1 ./scripts/test --package backup-stream --test integrations

### What did you expect?
Success.

### What did happened?
Failed. "no error loaded." (Because some of failpoints has been removed.)
